org.morphus.stereo

Class StereoCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.morphus.stereo.StereoCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Camera

    public class StereoCamera
extends Object
implements Camera
    Camera class to create the view for a given StereoChannel. The concept of camera does not exist in OpenGL, what this class does is create a frustum according to the given MoConfig and then attaches it to the desired Camera.Channel

    The channels, LEFT & RIGHT views will later be combined in the scene renderer to create the illusion of depth by means of stereopsis for binocular vision.

    The view that the camera is going to generate is controlled by the MoConfig.

    Author:
    In Aikun Electronics., Ahmed Shakil, Carolina Prieto Mu√±iz
    See Also:
    Camera.Channel, MoConfig
    Create Date
    12-19-2013
